title: A view of the dissertation upon the epistles of Phalaris, Themistocles, &c lately publish'd by the Reverend Dr. Bentley ; also of the examination of that dissertation by the Honourable Mr. Boyle, in order to the manifesting the incertitude of heathen chronology.
author: Milner, John, 1628-1702.
publisher: Printed by H.C. for John Jones ...,
notes: Running title: A view of Dr. Bentley's, and Mr. Boyle's dissertations &c.
Attributed to Milner by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
